    org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView nullPinterHandler​(java.lang.NullPointerException npe, java.util.Locale locale, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession httpSession)  
    (package private) org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView returnPageWithError​(org.springframework.http.HttpStatus httpStatus, java.lang.String localizedErrorMessage, java.lang.Throwable throwable, java.util.Locale locale, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession httpSession)
    1) Deletes the temporary file if it is exists in the temp directory 1.1) If MapPointsTrimmerApplication.debugModeIsOn() = true returns ModelAndView with forwarding to "/error" page with the localized message for a User and the full stack trace as the Model attribute "debugMessage" and the given HttpStatus. 1.2) If MapPointsTrimmerApplication.debugModeIsOn() = false returns ModelAndView with redirecting to "/trimmer" page with just the localized message for User and the given HttpStatus

      Parameters:
      ie - Occurs only in case of ShutdownController.shutdownApp(RedirectAttributes, Locale) cant shut the application down.
      Returns:
      HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR with the information how a User can shut the application down manually.

    • returnPageWithError

      org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView returnPageWithError​(org.springframework.http.HttpStatus httpStatus, java.lang.String localizedErrorMessage, java.lang.Throwable throwable, java.util.Locale locale, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession httpSession)
      1) Deletes the temporary file if it is exists in the temp directory 1.1) If MapPointsTrimmerApplication.debugModeIsOn() = true returns ModelAndView with forwarding to "/error" page with the localized message for a User and the full stack trace as the Model attribute "debugMessage" and the given HttpStatus. 1.2) If MapPointsTrimmerApplication.debugModeIsOn() = false returns ModelAndView with redirecting to "/trimmer" page with just the localized message for User and the given HttpStatus
      Parameters:
      httpStatus - To be returned to a User page
      localizedErrorMessage - Prepared and localized message to be returned to a User as the "userMessage" attribute
      throwable - To be logged here
      locale - To send a possible localized message to the end User from this method.
